code: import{useState}from'react';import Home from'./components/Home';import QuizList from'./components/QuizList';import CreateQuiz from'./components/CreateQuiz';import TakeQuiz from'./components/TakeQuiz';import Results from'./components/Results';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[section,setSection]=useState('home');const[currentQuiz,setCurrentQuiz]=useState(null);const[userAnswers,setUserAnswers]=useState([]);const[editingQuizId,setEditingQuizId]=useState(null);const navigate=function(newSection){let quiz=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:null;let answers=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:[];setSection(newSection);setCurrentQuiz(quiz);setUserAnswers(answers);setEditingQuizId(newSection==='createQuiz'&&quiz?quiz._id:null);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container animate-fadeIn",children:[section==='home'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Home,{navigate:navigate}),section==='quizList'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(QuizList,{navigate:navigate}),section==='createQuiz'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CreateQuiz,{navigate:navigate,editingQuizId:editingQuizId}),section==='takeQuiz'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TakeQuiz,{navigate:navigate,quiz:currentQuiz,userAnswers:userAnswers}),section==='results'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Results,{navigate:navigate,quiz:currentQuiz,userAnswers:userAnswers})]});}export default App;
